item.title: Exploring the Power of Open-Source Software
item.description:
Open-source software has become a powerful force in the technology world, shaping everything from operating systems to development tools. In this post, weâ€™ll explore what open-source software is, why it matters, and how it has revolutionized the way we build and use technology.

What is Open-Source Software?

Open-source software refers to software whose source code is made available to the public to view, use, modify, and distribute. This collaborative model of software development promotes transparency, community involvement, and innovation. Famous examples of open-source software include:
